title.narrative: FLC: CHAVITA project ?Reducing barrier preventing inclusion of the Deaf Population In Tanzania 2022-2023

description.narrative: In Tanzania policies and legislation ensuring the rights of the Deaf are in place since many years but not adequately implemented. Society in general and duty bearers/local authorities in particular are ignorant about the policies and legislation and are l acking practical knowledge and skills in providing the required services to the DeafDevelopment goal: Enhanced capacity of CHAVITA and their members to promote Deaf rights needs that better reflect citizens? rights especially those of marginalized groups ( Persons with disabilities and ethnic minority and women)Direct outcome: The articles protecting rights and wellbeing of Deaf persons including right to communication using the Tanzania Sign Language (LAT) as reflected in the Persons with Disabilities Act ( 2010) and the Postal and communication Act Section 38(1) (a) implemented in practice to facilitate inclusion of the Deaf population in Tanzanian society.Beneficiaries: Deaf people Other beneficiaries are Project staffs and partners government officials a t local and national levelTanzania Association of the Deaf is implementing partners. They were chosen according to the criteria announced in the call for the proposal. CHAVITA website : www.chavita.or.tz
